name: PKShareablePassMetadata
desc: Information that you use to configure the sharing sheet for a pass.

items.name: init?(provisioningCredentialIdentifier: String, cardConfigurationIdentifier: String, sharingInstanceIdentifier: String, passThumbnailImage: CGImage, ownerDisplayName: String, localizedDescription: String)
items.desc: Creates a shareable pass metadata object.

items.name: var ownerDisplayName: String
items.desc: The name of the person that receives a shared pass.

items.name: var passThumbnailImage: CGImage
items.desc: A thumbnail image of a pass that the system displays on the sharing sheet.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String
items.desc: A longer form of the pass description that the system displays on the sharing sheet.

items.name: var credentialIdentifier: String
items.desc: A developer-defined value that represents the user credentials of a pass.

items.name: var cardConfigurationIdentifier: String
items.desc: A developer-defined value that represents the configuration of a pass.

items.name: var sharingInstanceIdentifier: String
items.desc: A developer-defined unique value that you use to validate a shared pass.

items.name: var accountHash: String
items.desc: An Apple Push Notification push token.

items.name: var relyingPartyIdentifier: String
items.desc: An identifier used in push notifications.

items.name: var templateIdentifier: String
items.desc: An identifier used in push notifications.

items.name: init(provisioningCredentialIdentifier: String, sharingInstanceIdentifier: String, passThumbnailImage: CGImage, ownerDisplayName: String, localizedDescription: String, accountHash: String, templateIdentifier: String, relyingPartyIdentifier: String, requiresUnifiedAccessCapableDevice: Bool)
